H0.text: In what park would you find Half Dome, a mecca for rock climbers. Zion National Park

H1.text: In what park would you find Half Dome, a mecca for rock climbers. Rocky Mountain National Park

H2.text: In what park would you find Half Dome, a mecca for rock climbers. Grand Teton National Park

H3.text: In what park would you find Half Dome, a mecca for rock climbers. Yosemite

A4.text: The park contains dozens granite domes, including Sentinel Dome and Half Dome which rise 3,000 and 4,800 feet.

A5.text: The popular Half Dome hike to the summit of Half Dome requires a permit whenever the cables are up (usually from Memorial Day weekend to Columbus Day).
